text: inanite mets’ihafuni yeteset’achihu hoyi! fitochini sanabisina bejeribawochi layi sanimelisachewi weyimi yesenibetini balebetochi (yaferesutini) inideregemini saniregimachewi befiti ke’inanite gari yalewini yemiyaregagit’i hono baweredinewi (k’uri’ani) imenu፡፡ ye’alahimi ti‘izazi tefets’ami newi፡፡
